articles.title: China’s Xi meets American CEOs to boost confidence in world’s second largest economy - CNN
articles.description: Chinese leader Xi Jinping met more than a dozen US CEOs and academics on Wednesday as Beijing renewed efforts to woo back foreign investors and mend strained relations with the United States.
